body.p: A configuration parameter always use LittleCMS 2 to apply output color profilein darktable's core options(see Core options) defines how colors are rendered.

darktable can render colors either with its internal algorithms or by using the external library
LittleCMS2 . darktable's internal method is by an order of magnitude faster than the external one. The external option gives you a choice of the rendering intent and might offer a slightly higher accuracy in some cases.
Note that if the given ICC is LUT-based or contains both, a LUT and a matrix, darktable will use LittleCMS 2 to render the colors regardless of that configuration parameter's value.
